t: Amazon.com: Jobe Valves Megaflow Valve with DLT, 3/4", Yellow/Black : Industrial & Scientific
s: Jobe mega flow valves are float operated valves for the use of automated filling of water tanks. The valve is configured fro underwater mounting only. The float is connected to the valve with a nylon cord, this operates the pilot valve. When the water drops, the pilot valve is opened & the ...

t: Amazon.com : Jobe Valves J-TPP3/MFP3, Black Service Kit for TP/MF Valves : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: This service kit is the inner diaphragm assembly for jobe Topaz & jobe mega flow valves. Manufacturer item Tpp3 & Mfp3 fits all sizes of Topaz & mega flow valves. Designed to Rebuild Topaz & mega flow valves that have been in service for some time, & the inner diaphragm has become worn or leaking.
